DOC.brief_summary: Observational study regarding the use of supplements in chronic fatigue syndrome patients
DOC.brief_title: Observational Research on Use of Immunoprop Supplement in Chronic Fatigue Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: Detailed questionnaire regarding the diagnosis of an onset of chronic fatigue syndrome and 100 patients. using Karnofsky scale before and after use of supplements patient scores are compared in a double blind trial.
DOC.criteria: Fukuda criteria and Canadian consensus criteria will be the diagnosis criteria for patient selection non inclusion in the above criteria
